roleset.name: a sharp, biting, or piercing wail
roleset.note: KEEN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'keen' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from keen.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: sirens
example.text: Unsinkable slowed and stopped, hundreds of brilliant white flares swayedeerily down from the black, the air raid sirens ashore rose in a keeningshriek, the anti-aircraft guns coughed and chattered.

role.descr: target of enthusiasm, keen on what?

example.name: both args with PP
example.text: He is keen on the idea.

example.name: both args with clausal Arg1
example.text: She is keen to go fishing with him.
